body.name: Stick Vacuum Cleaner with 3 Mop Pads Electirc Mop 600W 18kpa Powerful Suction Corded Upright Vacuum Lightweight Electric mop for Tile Hardwood Floor,Marble Cleaning
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Saturday, February 17. Order within 1 hr 14 mins
features: 【18Kpa Powerful Suction】- Equipped with 600w powerful motor, our reecoo corded stick vacuum can generate 18kpa super suction,which could pick up the dust, pet hair ,tissue and other particle easily from hardwood floor, tile, marble floor and other uneven surface. REECOO Corded Stick Vacuum makes your cleaning easier!

【Mopping While Cleaning】- Our corded stick vacuum is not only a vacuum cleaner，but also a mop. You can mop the floor while vacuum the dust. The reecoo stick vacuum equipped with water tank and moping pad. You can equip it on your stick vacuum. Step lightly on the water tank, and the mopping pad will slowly be wet,at this time you can mop the floor while vacuum.

【Leak-proof Design】- Unique Volcano crater design ensures that the water tank will not leak. You don’t have to worry that the mopping pad will be extremely wet. Besides that,You don't have to worry about the mop getting moldy and stinky because it's so wet.（Tips：We suggest that you pour the water out of the tank after cleaning, rinse the pad with water, and let it dry）

【Light weight & Easy to Operating】- The stick vacuum is lightweight,and it only 3.3 lbs,You can use the long-mouthed nozzle to easily clean up the seams of curtains, sofas and floor seams that you can't reach. The assembling of the stick vacuum is very easy, we equipped Screws and screwdrivers in the package, Install the product according to the instructions.

【1 Year Warranty】- We are committed to providing great products and wonderful customer service for your valued friend. So we provides one year warranty, if there is any questions about this product, please feel free to ask us, we will communicate with you asap,and help you solve your problem.

It makes your cleaning easier. 600W Powerful motor can generate ≥18kpa suction，which could pick up the dust，hair，debris easily. Reecoo- Your Great Cleaning Partner

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Why choose REECOO REECOO was established in 8th August in 2013, which is committed in R&D, design and manufaturing of household cleaning products. We have a globally designated R & D and manufacturing scientific research team for electronic cleaning products, and its design and development ability, quality control ability and production supporting ability in the field of household cleaning products are among the best in the domestic industry.

Corded Vacuum Cleaner Package Includes 2 * Handle Poles 3 * Mop pad 3 * Vacuum Hepa 1* Long nozzle 1 * Water Tank 1 * Main Machine 1* Vacuum Head 1* Install small tools Reecoo Stick Vacuum Mopping while Cleaning REECOO corded vacuum cleaner is equipped with mopping pad,which achieves efficient cleaning method for both vacuuming and mopping. It makes your cleaning easier. 600W Powerful motor can generate ≥18kpa suction，which could pick up the dust，hair，debris easily. Reecoo- Your Great Cleaning Partner

Key Feature： 13ft Corded Design The length of the cord is 13ft，which could help you reach places you can't reach.It is very suitable for cleaning small rooms.You don't have to worry about finding a plug anymore Mopping while vacuuming Reecoo corded vacuum equipped with water tank and mopping pad,which could mop the floor while vacuuming,saving more time at cleaning house. Make clean be easier! Leakproof Design The water tank is designed to be Volcano crater leak proof, which could It can effectively prevent excessive water seepage from the water tank.When you want to use it,follow the sign and lightly step on the water tank, the water tank will spray the water at soon,which is very convenient. Easy to Storage The vacuum cleaner is very easy to storage. when you finish the cleaning, just pour out the water from the tank and wash the pad gently.The machine is designed to be upright,so you can put it in the tool room or corner, don't worry about him falling down.

Step 1 Check before use Before used,press the release button,open the dust tank,confirm HEPA installed inside,then put the dust tank back. Step 2 Handle Assembling Align the screw holes on the upper andlower covers of the handle with the aluminum tube(two holes)and tighten them with screws. Insert the upper part ofthe handle directly into the lower cover to make sure the connection is secure. Step 3 Handle install Align the metal tube with the hole in the middle of the handle and drive it through.

Step 4 Brush Install Insert the brush forcefully into the suction inlet of the dust cup and make sure the connection is firm. Step 5 Turn On Insert the power plug into the socket,set the power switch of the body to "1"(ON),then vacuum cleaner starts to work. Step 6 Storage Unplug the power,put the fuselage powerswitch to "0"(OFF),the vacuum cleaner power cord stops working.Wrap the around the two cord hooks and place it inthe storage area.

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good everyday stick vacuum
reviews.reviewText: I bought this to use on my tile floors. After the day I mopped the floors it helped to freshen everything up. We have 3 pets and they drag dirt. It’s a good purchase but it won’t replace your regular vacumm. More like a everyday kitchen vac/mop.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars LOVE this but the handle broke
reviews.reviewText: I absolutely love this it works great. But the plastic part that connects the handle together broke very easily without much pressure at all. And I tried to contact about it just for a new plastic part. But they want me to send the whole thing back and refund me or send a new one. I can still use it and don't want a new one just a new part. And apparently they don't do that. Or I'd have given 5 stars.

reviews.reviewText: Vacuums well but handle snapped on the 3rd use.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 25, 2023
reviews.reviewText: For a stick mop/vacuum, I have mixed feelings. Honestly, it really isn't worth the work or the $40.00. The vacuum is just a dust buster with a short cord, and the mop is a sponge pad with a tiny water reservoir. Filling it is a pain in the neck. The rubber gasket is insanely difficult to remove and install, the tank leaked and it doesn't hold much water. If you don't put some sort of cleaner in the tank or carry a spray bottle around, it doesn't clean anything. Furthermore, I highly doubt that the vacuum is wet rated, so constantly sucking up small amounts of water risks eventually destroying the vacuum, even if you are cleaning and drying the filter. The suction power is impressive however, and using just as a vacuum is acceptable, the cord is dramatically too short though. Cheap materials, poorly executed, and overall a waste of time. Maybe if you have a really small apartment or cabin, this may be advantageous. I have used it several times and end up cleaning the wood floors again because they just didn't get clean. I would rather just vacuum and steam mop once, so likely won't be using it again. It will find its new home in the camper where its small size and dual function can really be appreciated. I can't justify giving it less stars, simply because it doesn't advertise itself to be anything other than what it is. It did exactly what it stated, I just think conceptually it is a terrible idea.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A lotta power in a small package
reviews.reviewText: I don't tend to break out the giant upright vacuum out that often for a couple reasons (way too bulky, and way too loud compared to my Shark sweeper which gets similar results). However, every now and then, you just have to get the actual vacuum cleaner out. This is a neat one that can do both what the upright unit can do, as well as a handheld unit.Despite what the picture shows, you actually get three filters, not just two. It's powered from the wall, but it has a pretty long cable (about 16ft), so it's not too big of a deal. Since it is such a small device, that does unfortunately make it pretty noisy, but still not as loud as my full upright cleaner. I'd say it's a bit louder than my handheld Shark cleaner. That being said, this thing has way more power to it than either of my Shark cleaners. So much so that on a denser bit of carpet, it actually got a bit stuck! On the looser carpet though, it handled just fine. I don't have enough exposed hard flooring to try the mop out, so I can't review that.Switching from the upright to the handheld mode is just as simple as removing the dust tank and actual vacuum unit itself from the handle and the base, so just reverse the process you did to put it together. Having this two in one design is super convenient. One thing I will say is that I wish it had some sort of rotating brush to agitate the floor a bit, so that even more dust could be picked up, but it works well enough without it.I'm really happy with this. It's got the power you'd expect from an upright, while being a bit quieter, and way smaller. It won't fully replace the Shark sweeper, but it might replace the full upright vacuum cleaner for me.
